name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Btw anyone who is looking at this from a sheer numbers perspective should take the sureball 1m. Unless you're backing a sure winner who probably wouldn't pay you.    Projections change and 200% growth over 4 years isn't good enough for that timescale given that you can get money here and now.
